Translations.Text: Yakhana tumi o tomara sangira naukaya arohana karabe, takhana balah allahara sokara, yini amaderake jalema sampradayera kabala theke ud'dhara karechena.
Ara'o balah palanakarta, amake kalyanakara bhabe namiye da'o, tumi srestha abataranakari.
Ete nidarsanabali rayeche ebam ami pariksakari.
Atahpara an'ya eka sampradaya ami tara sthalabhisikta karechilama.
Ebam tadera'i ekajanake tadera madhye rasularupe prerana karechilama e'i bale ye, tomara allahara bandegi kara. Tini byatita tomadera an'ya kona mabuda ne'i. Tabu'o ki tomara bhaya karabe na

tamra sampradayera pradhanara yara kaphera chila, parakalera saksatake mithya balata ebam yaderake ami parthiba jibane sukha-sbacchandya diyechilama, tara balalah eto amadera mata'i ekajana manusa bai naya. Tomara ya kha'o, se'o ta'i khaya ebam tomara ya pana kara, se'o ta'i pana kare.
Yadi tomara tomadera mata'i ekajana manusera anugatya kara, tabe tomara niscitarupe'i ksatigrasta habe.
Se ki tomaderake e'i oyada deya ye, tomara mara gele ebam mrttika o asthite parinata hale tomaderake punarujjibita kara habe
tomaderake ye oyada deya hacche, ta kothaya hate pare
amadera parthibajibana'i ekamatra jibana. Amara mari o bamci ekhane'i ebam amara punarut'thita habo na.
Se to emana byakti bai naya, ye allaha sambandhe mithya udbhabana kareche ebam amara take bisbasa kari na.
Tini balalenah he amara palanakarta, amake sahayya kara, karana tara amake mithyabadi balache.
Allaha balalenah kichu dinera madhye tara sakala bela anutapta habe.
Atahpara satya satya'i eka bhayankara sabda taderake hatacakita karala ebam ami taderake batya-tarita abarjana sadrsa kare dilama. Atahpara dhbansa hoka papi sampradaya.
Erapara tadera pare ami bahu sampradaya srsti karechi.
